articles.title: Breaking the Stigma: Why Talking About Mental Health Matters
articles.author: Maria Gonzales
articles.preview_description: In a society where mental health is often swept under the rug, open conversations can be life-saving. This article explores how breaking the stigma can empower individuals to seek help and build more supportive communities.

articles.title: Self-Care Isn't Selfish: Building Your Mental Health Routine
articles.author: James Cruz
articles.preview_description: Taking care of your mental well-being should be a priority, not a luxury. Learn practical self-care tips you can incorporate into your daily life to boost resilience and emotional balance.

articles.title: How to Support a Friend With Depression
articles.author: Angela Reyes
articles.preview_description: Supporting a loved one with depression can feel overwhelming, but your presence can make a huge difference. This article offers actionable advice on how to be there for someone in a meaningful and healthy way.
